description:
Manning participated in the Pok√©mon World Tournament Junior Cup at the Kagome Town stadium. In the first round he was in the second match and faced off against Kenton. The match was quickly showcased and Manning won the battle and advanced to the second round while Kenton was eliminated from the tournament.
Isshu League Higaki Tournament
Manning also participated in the Isshu League Higaki Tournament. In the third round he was matched up against Imotaro who defeated him and Manning eliminated from the tournament.
name: Marufuji
